snippet: Uli Hoeness, the beloved former Bayern Munich soccer player who is now manager of the German club, is under growing pressure to resign over a tax scandal.
abstract: Uli Hoeness, beloved former national and Bayern Munich soccer player who is now manager of the German club, is under pressure to resign after a trial revealed that he had avoided as much as $38 million in taxes through two bank accounts in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Uli Hoeness, the beloved former Bayern Munich soccer player who is now manager of the German club, is under growing pressure to resign over a tax scandal.
